Vinyl Label – Discover the best vinyl label in 2025! Vinyl Label now available. Elevate your candle business with our Custom Waterproof Candle Labels, expertly designed for candle makers and small businesses seeking high-quality branding solutions. These durable vinyl labels are waterproof and tear-resistant, ensuring your branding remains flawless despite heat, moisture, or frequent handling. Waterproof & Durable: Premium polyurethane construction resists water, oil, and daily wear, protecting your labels and keeping them looking new. High-Resolution Printing: Crisp, vibrant colors showcase your brand and product details, helping your candles stand out on shelves and online marketplaces. Easy Application: Strong adhesive backing provides bubble-free, smooth placement on any candle jar or container—just peel, stick, and enjoy professional results. Fully Customizable: Choose from multiple sizes and shapes, upload your own design, and create labels that perfectly match your unique brand vision. Available Sizes: 2" x 2" – Ideal for mini candles or sample jars 3" x 3" – Perfect for standard candle jars 4" x 2" – Great for specialty and tapered candles 5" x 3" – Premium choice for luxury or gift candles Order Easily: Simply select your size, upload your artwork, and receive your custom printed labels in 3-5 days. Perfect for boosting small business branding, creating memorable wedding or event favors, or labeling handmade and seasonal candle collections.
